title: Bad image???
body: umm when I opened league today it said leagueclient.exe - Bad image how do I fix this?

replies.body: This is usually caused by an anti-virus program blocking league's files from being accessed.  Adding your entire Riot games folder as an exception in that should do the trick.  You'll likely need to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) after adding the exception to make sure everything can install properly.
